00001 #ifndef _SPECTRAL_DISPLAY_H
00002 #define _SPECTRAL_DISPLAY_H   1
00003 /************************************************************************
00004  *                                                                      *
00005  * This subclass of object implements an object for calculating         *
00006  * spans, overlaps, etc. for spectral display using the Chirp Z         *
00007  * transform.                                                           *
00008  *                                                                      *
00009  * File: SpectralDisplay.h                                              *
00010  *                                                                      *
00011  * Revision history:                                                    *
00012  *  1. 09/07/99  - Started                                              *
00013  ************************************************************************/
00014 
00015 #include <Filters/DataWindow.h>
00016 
00017 #define DEFAULT_SAMPLING        22.1184e6       // 66.3552/3
00018 #define DEFAULT_WINDOW          BLACKMAN_HARRIS4
00019 #define DEFAULT_ACQ_SPAN        10.e6
00020 #define DEFAULT_SPAN            120.e6
00021 #define DEFAULT_RBW             1.e6
00022 #define DEFAULT_CENTER          900.e6
00023 #define DEFAULT_STEP            614.4e3
00024 
00025 #define MIN_SPAN                10.e3
00026 #define MAX_SPAN                2.5e9
00027 #define MIN_CENTER              25.e6
00028 #define MAX_CENTER              1.2e9
00029 #define MIN_RBW                 100.
00030 #define MAX_RBW                 10.e6
00031 #define MAX_SAMPLING            100.e6
00032 #define MIN_SAMPLING            100.
00033 #define DEFAULT_DISP_POINTS     501
00034 
00035 class SpectralDisplay
00036 {
00037 private:
00038   DataWindow    *_dataWindow;                   // Data windowing object
00039 
00040   int           _displayPoints;                 // Desired # of display points
00041 
00042   float         _spanRange;                     // Total desired span in Hertz
00043   float         _centerFrequency;               // Center frequency of span in Hertz
00044   float         _acquisitionSpan;               // Max span in Hertz for a single acquisition
00045   float         _samplingFrequency;             // sampling frequency in Hertz for single acquisition
00046   float         _resolutionBW;                  // desired resolution BW in Hertz
00047   float         _synthesizerStepSize;           // Size of the RF LO step size in Hertz
00048 //
00049 // Private functions
00050 //
00051 
00052 public:
00053   SpectralDisplay(float span=DEFAULT_SPAN, float center=DEFAULT_CENTER,
00054                   float acqSpan=DEFAULT_ACQ_SPAN, float sampling=DEFAULT_SPAN,
00055                   float rbw=DEFAULT_RBW,
00056                   int windowType=DEFAULT_WINDOW);       // Class constructor
00057  ~SpectralDisplay();                                    // Class destructor
00058 
00059 /**********************
00060  * Set parameters:    *
00061  **********************/
00062   void  setTotalSpan(float totalSpan);
00063   void  setCenterFrequency(float center);
00064 
00065   void  setAcquisitionSpan(float acqSpan);
00066   void  setSamplingFrequency(float samplingFreq);
00067   void  setResolutionBW(float rbw);
00068   void  setWindowType(int type);
00069   void  setSynthesizerStepSize(float step);
00070 
00071 //*********************************************************************************************
00072 // The following functions return previously set parameters
00073 //
00074 // windowType:          Returns the specified window function type
00075 // spanRange:           Returns the specified span in Hertz
00076 // centerFrequency      Returns the span center frequency in Hertz
00077 // acquisitionSpan:     Returns the specified max span for a single acq in Hertz.
00078 // samplingFrequency:   Returns the specified sampling frequency for a single acq in Hertz.
00079 // resolutionBW:        Returns the specified resolution BW in Hertz.
00080 // synthesizerStepSize  Returns the specified synthesizer step in Hertz.
00081 //*****************************************************************************************
00082   int           windowType()                    {return _dataWindow->windowType();      }
00083   float         spanRange()                     {return _spanRange;                     }
00084   float         centerFrequency()               {return _centerFrequency;               }
00085   float         acquisitionSpan()               {return _acquisitionSpan;               }
00086   float         samplingFrequency()             {return _samplingFrequency;             }
00087   float         resolutionBW()                  {return _resolutionBW;                  }
00088   float         synthesizerStepSize()           {return _synthesizerStepSize;           }
00089 
00090 //*********************************************************************************************
00091 // The following functions return calculated parameters
00092 //
00093 // numberAcquisitionsFor: Returns # of acquisitions given an input overlap # spectral points
00094 // dataSize:            Returns size of windowed data to achieve RBW
00095 // synthesizerSteps     Returns the number of synthesizer steps between acquisitions
00096 // frequencySpacing:    Returns the frequency spacing in Hz
00097 // overlapRange:        Returns overlap range in frequency given synth step size, etc. 
00098 //*****************************************************************************************
00099   int           numberAcquisitions();
00100   int           dataSize();
00101   int           synthesizerSteps();
00102   float         frequencySpacing();
00103   float         overlapRange();
00104   float         acqStartFrequencyFor(int acqNumber);
00105   float         acqCenterFrequencyFor(int acqNumber);
00106   float         acqEndFrequencyFor(int acqNumber);
00107   int           acqPointsFor(int acqNumber, float startFreq=-1.);
00108   int           acqOverlapPointsFor(int acqNumber=0, float lastEnd=-1.);
00109 
00110 };
